1.eng-name: The Book of Purification and its Sunnah

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Abu Hurairah said:It was said: "O Messenger of Allah, we want to come to the mosque, but the path that we walk upon is impure." The Messenger of Allah said: "Some parts of the earth purify others

chapter.eng-name: Parts of the earth purify each other
